tweet: I'm working feverishly in the lab to bring the best deals on beauty products to the masses...
Being a mad-scientist there's never a dull moment... The experiment is beginning soon.
The question is, what's most compelling... Looking good? Younger? Or either/both cheap. The mad scientist is on the hunt for answers!
Oh, so many options for the first beauty deal of the day... I wonder what it will be? When will it appear? How many will be lucky to get it?
Busy day in the lab today... Gotta get things in working order so I can save you money while making you look gorgeous!
